target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to grow their personal brand and generate revenue through LinkedIn
pain_points: not knowing how to monetize audience
target_markets.market_size_indicators: LinkedIn described as '2024 equivalent of 2020 Twitter' - massive untapped opportunity

problems_validated.problem: Most people don't know about LinkedIn's new video tab and video content opportunities
problems_validated.severity: High - missing out on 'fishing with dynamite' opportunity
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional text posts and basic content
problems_validated.market_gap: Video content on LinkedIn is underutilized despite high reach potential

products_tools.name: 11 Labs
products_tools.use_case: AI voice generation for faceless video content creation

business_strategies.implementation: Start with social media account, build audience, create community, then build product for that community
business_strategies.case_study: Boring Marketing started as Twitter account, grew to community, then built AI SEO tool generating 7-8M ARR

business_strategies.strategy: Build audience first, then monetize through products/services
business_strategies.implementation: Focus on one social platform, grow following, convert to revenue streams
business_strategies.expected_results: Millions of dollars of revenue flowing into businesses
business_strategies.case_study: Speaker went from 0 to 145k LinkedIn followers, generated millions in revenue

problems_solutions.problem: LinkedIn posts with external links get lower reach
problems_solutions.solution: Post content first, wait 4 hours, then edit to add external links
steps: Create and publish post without links
Edit post to add external links
problems_solutions.time_estimate: 4 hour delay between posting and adding links

problems_solutions.problem: Difficulty creating video content for LinkedIn
problems_solutions.solution: Create faceless video content using AI tools or record yourself
steps: Use AI tools to create video content
Record voiceover or use 11 Labs for AI voice

startup_ideas.target_market: Businesses needing SEO, ads, or design services
startup_ideas.business_model: Productized service offerings using AI assistance
startup_ideas.validation: Speaker runs 4 agencies, 3 are AI-assisted productized agencies

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Adding external links immediately when posting on LinkedIn
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Significantly reduced post reach and engagement
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Wait 4 hours after posting before editing to add external links
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Multiple comments mention this was an eye-opener they didn't know about

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Starting with product before building audience
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: No validated market demand, harder to find customers
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Use ACP funnel - build audience first, then community, then product
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Most people build software first, speaker starts with Twitter account instead

steps: Create faceless or personal video content
Use agreeable captions like 'the future is now'
growth_tactics.results_expected: High reach due to LinkedIn prioritizing video content

steps: Pair each story with interesting personal photos
Post stories with vulnerable, relatable content
Create video content using AI tools
Use 11 Labs to generate AI voice reading script
ai_workflows.use_case: Creating video content without appearing on camera

metrics_kpis.benchmark: 145k followers in 14 months with 15 hours total work
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on video content and storytelling with photos

trends_signals.trend: LinkedIn becoming the new Twitter for viral content
trends_signals.opportunity: Massive growth potential before platform becomes saturated - described as 'fishing with dynamite'

trends_signals.trend: LinkedIn prioritizing video content with new video tab
trends_signals.opportunity: First-mover advantage for video creators on LinkedIn platform

actionable_quotes.quote: LinkedIn is fishing with dynamite right now
actionable_quotes.context: Comparing current LinkedIn opportunity to 2020 Twitter growth potential
actionable_quotes.actionability: Start creating LinkedIn content immediately to capitalize on algorithm favorability

actionable_quotes.quote: We start a Twitter account and if the Twitter account gets traction... then we know that there's something there
actionable_quotes.actionability: Test business ideas through social media traction before building products

key_statistics.statistic: 0 to 145,000 LinkedIn followers in 14 months with 15 hours total work
7-8 million ARR projected for Boring Marketing next year
key_statistics.context: Revenue from business that started as Twitter account

comment_insights.insight: The 4-hour link editing hack was unknown to many users and highly valuable
comment_insights.evidence: Multiple comments mentioning this was an 'eye-opener' and they 'finally got their answer'
comment_insights.author: @@BreakHabits, @@rossmccabe1016, @@megham_
comment_insights.relevance: Shows there's demand for advanced LinkedIn growth tactics that aren't widely known

comment_insights.evidence: Greg, this is the kind of information most people gatekeep, and you're just out here sharing the sauce, for free!
comment_insights.author: @@joejauregui1372
comment_insights.relevance: Indicates market demand for transparent, actionable business advice

comment_insights.insight: Multiple viewers are already implementing LinkedIn strategies
comment_insights.evidence: I've been on this, for 3 months now. Definitely the wave
comment_insights.author: @@kevincarter766
comment_insights.relevance: Validates that LinkedIn growth is becoming a recognized trend among entrepreneurs

top_validated_comments.comment: Man, that part about editing posts 4h later to add links was such an eye-opener!
top_validated_comments.author: @@BreakHabits
top_validated_comments.business_value: Reveals common LinkedIn growth problem that many users face but don't understand

top_validated_comments.comment: I appreciate the insights you related from LinkedIn staff. I didn't know that waiting 4 hrs to edit a post to add an external link can increase reach.
top_validated_comments.author: @@rossmccabe1016
top_validated_comments.business_value: Confirms insider knowledge has high value and demand in LinkedIn marketing space

comment_derived_trends.trend: High demand for LinkedIn algorithm insights and growth hacks
supporting_comments: finally got my answer about links
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Opportunity for LinkedIn growth courses, tools, or consulting services focused on algorithm optimization

comment_derived_trends.trend: Appreciation for transparent, non-gatekept business advice
supporting_comments: don't shy away from calling out the cringe
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Content creators who share insider knowledge transparently can build strong audience loyalty and trust

meta.title: How to get 145k followers on LinkedIn in 1 year (it takes less than 1h/week)
